about_the_game:
Plot

Dmitry Morozov is the protagonist and a simple worker who laid down his life on the altar of the factory. It seemed to him that time was lost, but one day it reset its course. The reality in which he found himself is completely different from the previous one, and his reflection in the mirror is young again. What secrets await him on his journey back home? And is there any point in going back there? He doesn't know, but he will definitely try to find out.

Heroines

Anna Koryagina is a strict and demanding master and also a deeply unhappy woman. Her life is made up of work and lonely evenings drinking, but don't underestimate her. Getting under her thumb is a cinch, and she can get into the swing of things.

Anastasia Kolokolchikova is an assembler and the sweetest creature in the world, if you don't dig too deep. She'll help you with a smile and give you a tour of the factory, she'll bury you in the backyard with a smile. Something is definitely wrong with her, but it's a mystery behind seven seals, the key to which is not easy to pick up.

Alexandra Pugacheva is not just a luxurious blonde from a regulatory area, but also the smartest character, contrary to stereotypes. He spends his life on bile, constantly egging on the main character and stealing factory murder. Quarrelsome and cold in communication, but deep down she has a kind and sensual nature that simply lacks attention.

Olga Sokolova is a girl locksmith, determined to fight stereotypes in her profession to the last. She is scary in anger, but even more scary with a slipper. Likes to collect change, doesn't like slackers.

Karelia Vereshchagina is a natural disaster from the design office. She is fickle and irrepressible, because she keeps one terrible secret, which slowly torments her. She is the kind of person who is hard to fall in love with, but who you can't get out of your head.

Main Features

*Five heroines, telling about technical specialties in demand at the factory
*Nostalgic graphics transporting back in time
*Music consisting of Sovetwave and Synthwave compositions
*The voice of the main characters
